thought: The website https://primeinvestedge.com/ is a scam website. - result: True

observation.reason: The website makes claims of unusually high profits and low risk uses psychological manipulation in their texts and has been reported as an investment scam on reputable consumer review platforms. The domain registration details seem to be valid but the content of the website and external reviews indicate that it is a scam.
